price: 35. Kaadu wohim (amó tabsitteey, .) dahabak keenih abak neneeh, wohim inkih tu-hinna addunyâ manoh midir (duyyê) kee ruñó baxá akkewaytek, akeerâ niqmat (jannat kinnuk) ku-Rabbih garil cagalah Yallak meesitá marih iimi (moominiin kinnuk).
arabic: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhālika lammā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-ākhiratu ʿinda rabbika lil'muttaqīna
